description: As a versatile IT and UX professional, I bring hands-on experience delivering both technical support and user-centered design solutions. In my role as an Associate IT Field Support Specialist, I provided Tier 2 support through desk-side, phone, and email channels—resolving hardware and software issues, deploying and configuring devices, and documenting technical solutions. I worked collaboratively across teams to ensure smooth IT operations and end-user satisfaction. Simultaneously, I contributed to creating intuitive, accessible, and visually engaging digital experiences. I supported user research, prototyping, wireframing, and usability testing for web and mobile platforms. My ability to translate business requirements into effective user journeys and interface designs has helped bridge the gap between technical functionality and user experience. With a strong foundation in troubleshooting, customer interaction, and iterative design, I thrive in environments where cross-functional collaboration and continuous improvement are key.

As an Associate Application Developer, I served as a vital link between business units and technical teams, aligning operational needs with IT solutions. I led stakeholder interviews, created detailed business process documentation, and translated complex requirements into actionable user stories, workflows, and system enhancements. Using tools like Visio, use case diagrams, and value stream mapping, I contributed to strategic planning and the development of business cases that improved performance and reduced costs. On the development side, I supported the full software development lifecycle—designing, coding, testing, and deploying application solutions based on defined business needs. I collaborated closely with analysts to transform requirements into scalable application features, provided maintenance and support for production systems, and ensured quality assurance through unit testing and documentation. My work involved routine yet impactful contributions to core applications, always with a focus on user experience, performance, and reliability.

I supported mission-critical government operations through a combination of hands-on technical maintenance and strategic hardware lifecycle management. In election operations, I maintained and repaired mechanical and electronic machines, conducted functional testing, and ensured readiness and accuracy in compliance with strict regulatory standards. I participated in the setup, logistics, and delivery of equipment and materials, working in fast-paced, high-volume environments that required coordination, precision, and safety awareness. I also oversaw the full lifecycle of IT hardware, including procurement, inventory tracking, reconciliation, and end-of-life refresh planning. I analyzed usage data and financial trends to optimize inventory control, prevent shrinkage, and support department-level forecasting and budgeting. I contributed to operations and policy enforcement, reviewed vendor contracts, and collaborated across teams to align hardware standards with organizational needs. My work blended technical, operational, and analytical responsibilities in support of secure, efficient, and cost-effective public service delivery.
